Membership includes 10 day advance tee times, G.P.S. system, complimentary range balls and club storage. Membership valid October 1, 2025 to September 30th, 2026. All prices are subject to additional applicable sales tax. Membership is capped at 225 and there is currently a waitlist. If you would like to add your name to the waitlist please call Maria Cowan at 305-604-4067 or email

Outings & Events
We pride ourselves in exceeding our guests expectations.
Miami Beach Golf Club is the premier venue to host your next corporate golf outing or tournament. We guarantee a memorable experience for all of your participants. When you host your outing at the Miami Beach Golf Club, you and your guests will be treated to the very best the game has to offer. From tee prizes and tournament scoring to catering and cocktail receptions, Miami Beach Golf Club can provide for all of your tournament needs. Even if you're not the world's greatest golfer, the Jim McLean Golf Academy can host a variety of pre-tournament clinics to help you and your guests learn more about the game of golf.
When you book a tournament at Miami Beach Golf Club, all you have to do is tell us how many players will be participating, when you want to play, and what food and beverage services will be needed. We take care of everything else. Our tournament coordinator and professional golf staff work with all groups before and during your event. We make sure everything runs to your satisfaction, and our staff will ensure you and your guests enjoy a memorable day of golf.
For information on hosting your next golf outing or tournament at Miami Beach Golf Club, contact Maria Cowan at (305) 604-4067 or email Maria at
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
.
We pride ourselves in exceeding our guests expectations.
The following amenities and services are included with your golf outing or tournament:
Professional and courteous bag handling.
Complimentary range balls prior to the tournament.
Registration table.
Alphabetical list and hole assignment sheets for check-in.
Signage in parking lot, clubhouse, and driving range.
Announcements and Rules sheets.
Scoreboard and event summary.
On course special events (closest to the pin, long drive, etc.)
Placement of sponsor (hole) signs.
Awards presentation (on request).
GPS Yardage System in every cart.
The following upgraded amenities and services may be added for an additional charge:
Golf Clinic conducted by PGA Professionals.
Putting Contest.
"Beat the Pro" contest on a selected par 3.
Pro Shop merchandise gift certificates.
Rental Clubs.
Goody bags or prized packs.
On course hand towel service.
Personalized merchandise with your logo.
Anything you request, we can do.
